user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (mark.thompson@email.com) with some wellness tips. Tell her she can check her NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Wellness Tips Email

Hi Jane,

I’m writing on behalf of Mark Thompson. He would greatly appreciate it if you could send him an email at mark.thompson@email.com with some wellness tips to help him manage stress. Mark mentioned that you’re welcome to consult your NotionManager for any relevant information or resources you’ve gathered.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Assistant]  
(on behalf of Mark Thompson)
